medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive intention tremor and cerebellar ataxia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at age 57 and progressed asymmetrically, worsening on the right side. All aspects of the patient’s life were compromised, especially writing, feeding, and walking. He experienced dysarthria, postural and action tremor.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Genetic testing showed FMR1 gene premutation with 150–200 CGG repeats. Previous treatments included propranolol, primidone, and clonazepam with no significant improvement.
medical_history.family_history: Positive family history of fragile X syndrome.
